sample.title: Avalanche (DES)
sample.summary: This template demonstrates the avalanche effect in the DES cipher.
sample.description: This template shows how the Avalanche Visualization component can be used to demonstrate the avalanche effect in the DES cipher.
sample.title: Avalanche (DES)
